https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yyvjHlEAZRF3u4b22Dk0dgAx6PU.jpg The film is about a dreamy girl who belongs to a middle class family. She is dominated by her father who is characterized by severe authority, goodness and tenderness, by conservatism and liberalism. The family lives in a heterogeneous quarter with contradictions among its inhabitants. Dreamy Visions
